featured.name: U Wanna Study Somewhere?
featured.blurb: Full-stack application to crowd-source reviews for common UW study spots! Future features for account and identity management, AI-based reccomendations, and mobile app integration.

projectlist.name: Personal Portfolio
projectlist.subtitle: This site!
projectlist.blurb: Built website completely from scratch to improve my React and Tailwind skills. The content is dynamically generated (no hardcoded values) as well as support for animations, light mode, and mobile view.

projectlist.name: Chess
projectlist.subtitle: OOP final project
projectlist.blurb: Game of chess using object-oriented concepts. Features include multiplayer and computer options, setup mode, and test suites for automatic testing.

projectlist.name: Trip Tracker
projectlist.subtitle: HackMIT
projectlist.blurb: This app automatically tracks travel methods and emissions reduced. It features leaderboards for reducing carbon emissions and provides insights into personal travel habits.

projectlist.name: MonitUr Time
projectlist.subtitle: Hack the North
projectlist.blurb: Chrome extension with the purpose of tracking daily Chrome activity. Measurements like toxonomy, how long you spend on each website, and your most popular websites are all tracked in the background which we can view using a popup.
